thread.title: Ground News - Royals Ace Is Full Of Praise For Superstar Teammate
thread.title_full: Ground News - Royals Ace Is Full Of Praise For Superstar Teammate

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Royals Ace Is Full Of Praise For Superstar Teammate
text:
Summary by Ground News The Kansas City Royals drafted star shortstop Bobby Witt Jr. in 2019. They traded for pitcher Cole Ragans, whose career was stagnant in the Texas Rangers. Ragans posted an incredible 2.64 ERA in 71.2 frames after coming over from Texas. Witt just hit 30 home runs and stole 49 bases with a .813 OPS in 2023. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Cold Wire Royals Ace Is Full Of Praise For Superstar Teammate (Photo by Jamie Squire/Getty Images) It’s amazing how the outlook of a franchise can change in a span of just a couple of years. That’s why it is of vital importance to excel in every aspect of front office management: scouting talent, drafting, trading, spotting international prospects, signing the right free agents, and developing your own players. You can say that has happened to the Kansas City Royals. They drafted star shortstop Bobby Wit…
